channel.title: Cook-book misprint "salt and freshly ground black people"
channel.description:
http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/world/asia-pacific/8627335.stm
Cook-book misprint costs Australian publishers dear An Australian publisher has had to pulp and reprint a cook-book after one recipe listed "salt and freshly ground black people" instead of black pepper.
Made me laugh, somebody probably did it for the luls. Does give me faith in humanity that nobody seems to have pulled the racist card yet

item.title: Cook-book misprint "salt and freshly ground black people"
item.dc:creator: @IBOutlet IBOutlet
item.description:
@IBOutlet wrote:

Goes really well with a vegemite sandwich and some JUICE.

item.title: Cook-book misprint "salt and freshly ground black people"

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I could see a spell-checking program making that error ‘peper’ to ‘people’ or something similar.

Read full topic

Cook-book misprint costs Australian publishers dear

An Australian publisher has had to pulp and reprint a cook-book after one recipe listed “salt and freshly ground black people” instead of black pepper.

Made me laugh, somebody probably did it for the luls.

Does give me faith in humanity that nobody seems to have pulled the racist card yet
